Location: Convention Center - Centro de Eventos

Session chair: Jhanira Rodriguez (SDSN Bolivia)

Race to Zero: Strategies for Emissions Reductions at UPB

In this session we present the report on UPBs greenhouse gas emissions, and we invite students, researchers and authorities to help elaborate emissions reduction strategies in an interactive session.
